entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 early in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
